caption: JPMorgan has thrived in a period of higher interest rates
trend_summary: The line graph shows the share price of JPMorgan Chase & Co. from 2020 to mid-2024. The stock price experienced volatility with a general upward trend, starting around $100 in 2020, dipping, and then rising to a peak above $200 in 2024 before a slight downturn. The most significant growth occurred from late 2023 into 2024.
author: Joshua Franklin
article_title: JPMorgan shares fall after warning on 'too high' earnings outlook
